creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: hair comb shaped like a crescent moon; bristles in the center of the comb; etched designs on both sides of the comb; Side 1: bird on left, butterfly over bristles, moose-like creature on right; Side 2: phoenix-like birds on left and right with a butterfly over the bristles; top of comb has small, rounded points
title: Hair comb
